title: Wahlmodul Wirtschaftswissenschaften
description: Wahlveranstaltungen aus dem Mannheim Master in Management (MMM).
descriptionEn: Elective courses from the Mannheim Master in Management (MMM).

goals.title: Wahlmodul WiSo (MMM)
goals.description: Mind. 24 ECTS aus dem MMM (Accounting, Marketing, Management).
goals.descriptionEn: At least 24 ECTS from MMM (Accounting, Marketing, Management).

goals.title: MMM Kurse
goals.description: Individuelle Wahl aus dem MMM-Katalog (z.B. ACC 5XX, MKT 5XX).
goals.descriptionEn: Individual choice from MMM catalog (e.g. ACC 5XX, MKT 5XX).
